properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Southern USVI, Vieques, and Eastern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 4:34PM AST until March 4 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...A northerly swell will continue to invade the local waters...

.Winds and seas will continue to increase with the arrival of a
frontal boundary and a northerly swell. This will create
hazardous seas that will spread across the local waters through at
least Wednesday afternoon.

* WHAT...Increasing seas up to 7 feet with occasional seas up to 9
feet. East to northeast winds up to 15 knots with occasionally
higher gusts.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Southern USVI Vieques and Eastern
Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Tuesday to 2 AM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be choppy an hazardous to small
craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TUESDAY TO 2 AM AST WEDNESDAY
